name: route
summary: Calculate shortest/fastest path between two points
description:
The route command finds the optimal path between two points using Dijkstra's algorithm on the OSM road network. It supports different travel modes with appropriate speed limits and access restrictions.

The output includes the route geometry, total distance, and estimated travel time.

options.--mode, -m: Travel mode: walk, bike, drive (default: drive)

output:
Text: Human-readable route summary with distance and time
GeoJSON: Route geometry as LineString with properties
JSON: Structured route data with turn-by-turn segments
